name: Nova Charm
description:
Nova Charm is a SciFi paintballing free-for-all for Mac and PC currently in development by Celestial Interactive. Inspired by seriously fun shooters such as Splatoon and Halo, Nova Charm with its cyber-punk art style aims to offer players a free and fun experience.

Credits

Developed by Alexander Laurence (United Kingdom)

Brain freeze icon by Lorc

Sound Effects by Taira Komori (Fukuoka, Japan)

Music by Sei Mutsuki, PeriTune (Japan)

Character design by Pior Oberson (France)

Multiplayer development by Gewaltig Store (Russia)

Third person engine by Gewaltig Store (Russia)

Paintball engine by David Baker (United States)

Environment design by Synty Studios (New Zealand)

Weapon design by MeowingMammoth, Sirpi, Grasbock & Blackham Content Creations

Logo design by Unruly Games
